reviews.text: the aroma is malty and herbal with shades of hay, buckwheat, grain and herbs... the taste is malty with notes of straw, nuts, flowers and some grains... sweet, bitter and dry aftertaste...
Фигня фигней. Как и обычно у Балтики, во вкусе ощущает& алкогол& Невкусн& Не берите.

the aroma is caramel and fruity with hints of port, plum, vanilla, toffee, nuts, raisin and some spices... the taste is fruity and caramel with notes of dried plum, red wine, almond, toffee, raisin and sweet citrus... the aftertaste is sweet, dry and warming... great beer...
